posts.post_title: FS 32 card lot w/Hindu, AB, etc.
posts.post_content:
Sold. Lot includes the following:

Hindu - 1 (Lindaman w/one minor crease at top)
American Beauty - 4
Walsh Piedmont VG-EX
Cycle - 2
El Principe de Gales - 1
Tolstoi - 1
Old Mill - 1
Polar Bear - 1
Piedmont commons - 10
Sweet Caporal commons - 10

Most have some degree of creasing or back damages.  SOLD Email [url]drumback2@gmail.com[/url] for scans.
